result.value: Interpretable prioritization of splice variants in diagnostic next-generation sequencing
Super-quick Information Content and Random Forest Learning for Splice Variants

Most users should download the latest Squirls distribution ZIP file from
the [Releases page](https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/releases). 
Please consult the Read the docs site for detailed documentation:
- [stable version](https://squirls.readthedocs.io/en/master) describing the latest release at the *Releases page*, or
- [latest version](https://squirls.readthedocs.io/en/latest) summarizing the latest development on `development` branch.

version:01-07-2021

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Add `--out-dir` option, rework prefix by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/44
* Fix hard-coded versions by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/47
* Fix bug in allele generator by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/51

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1
result.name: v2.0.1

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Simplify CLI - the configuration file is no longer necessary
* Update download links by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/33
* Add bootstrap module to enable configuration without Spring by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/32
* Use Svart v2.0.0 and SilentGenes v0.2.3 by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/39
* Fix unclear instruction about output file by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/40
* Support HGVS `g.` token in `annotate-pos` input by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/41
* Externalize the project files required for building Squirls database. by @ielis in https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TheJacksonLaboratory/Squirls/compare/v1.0.0...v2.0.0
result.name: v2.0.0

result.description:
**The manuscript version**

- `squirls-cli`
  - allow to block-compress (`bgzip`) the annotated VCF on the fly by using `-f vcfgz` option
  - do not fail due to an exception being thrown by Jannovar when annotating a VCF file
  - do not sort variants in the VCF output if the required header lines are missing
  - allow precalculating scores for regions of interest with `precalculate` command
  - use `vmvt v0.9.4`
- `squirls-ingest`
  - prevent ingesting transcripts with duplicate *ENST* id
result.name: v1.0.0

result.description:
`Squirls`
  - make the code repository public, enable *Read the Docs* integration
`squirls-cli`
  - finalize the HTML report and SVG graphics layout
  - allow writing results in multiple result formats, including VCF, TSV/CSV 
  - report positions of candidate cryptic variants
  - add distribution zip
`squirls-core`
  - use `apiguardian-api` to label the API elements
  - use `svart v1.0.0` to represent variants, genomic regions, and the other genomic coordinates
  - remove external dependencies such as `JBlas`, 
`squirls-ingest`
  - download genomic assembly report
  - calculate SHA256 checksums
  - replace `argparse4j` by `picocli`
`squirls-io`
  - create the module for handling creation of Squirls structures
`squirls-spring-boot-autoconfigure`
  - fix bug involving database initialization in HPC environments
result.name: v1.0.0-RC4

result.description:
Pre-release with the following improvements:
- `Squirls`
  - improve documentation
  - use Jannovar `v0.35`, SLF4J `v1.7.30`
- `squirls-cli`
  - use Picocli for CLI definition, prettify CLI
  - support HTML and VCF output formats
  - numerous bug fixes
  - allow to specify # threads
  - improve progress reporting
- `squirls-core`
  - mark API classes
- `squirls-ingest`
  - create a ZIP file after ingest
  - add sanity checks for transcripts
result.name: v1.0.0-RC3

result.description:
Pre-release with the following improvements:
- `squirls-cli`
  - implement commands `annotate-csv`, `annotate-vcf`, and `annotate-pos`
  - prettify the HTML report produced by `analyze-vcf` command
- `squirls-core`
  - performance improvements, increase test coverage
  - improve handling of positions with missing conservation scores
result.name: v1.0.0-RC2
